Shadow PC is your ecosystem in the cloud.

Shadow strives to become the definitive cloud platform for gamers, creatives, and businesses, because we believe that cloud technologies have the potential to bring technological freedom to all.

Your PC, in the cloud. Shadow is the easiest way to access a full PC, instantly, on all the devices you own. From $29,99 (commitment-free).

At SHADOW, we strive to become the definitive cloud platform for gamers, creatives, and businesses, because we believe that cloud technologies have the potential to bring technological freedom to all. In today’s world, doing what you love shouldn’t mean worrying about components and buying expensive gear. Anyone should be able to access high-end tech, so we set ourselves to break those limits for good. This single idea, with innovation, challenge and free-thinking at heart, brought us together to shape the way we experience technology.

SHADOW’s original product was released in 2016 with the promise of allowing all individuals to enjoy the power of a high-end PC from the cloud. Now a global cloud computing company chaired by Octave Klaba, OVHcloud founder, SHADOW looks forward notably through new cloud solutions for both personal and business use.

With Shadow, everyone can access a full Windows PC, in the cloud, from anywhere and with the device of their choice. Thanks to the efforts of R&D teams, we continue to improve and expand our service, all this while maintaining the same affordable price, despite the recent evolution of energy costs and various component shortages. In 2022, SHADOW’s revamped subscription service featured a brand new Power Upgrade, including better performance and infinite possibilities.

SHADOW’s vision and ambitions go beyond pure cloud-computing. Also introduced in 2022, Shadow Drive is a safe and affordable online-storage solution built in partnership with Nextcloud, the world leading open-source file-sharing platform. Shadow Drive is fully secured through traffic encryption and will ultimately be available in all markets Shadow operates in, through its servers based and operated in Europe.

SHADOW also offers its expertise to professionals and companies, with custom-built projects responding to their specific needs. In 2022, the company announced Shadow Business Solutions, SHADOW’s cloud services dedicated to organizations and individuals seeking innovative and flexible cloud-based services to achieve their work.

How it all started, from gaming to the cloud:

Like many young entrepreneurs, our co-founders lived for their passions: for them, it was technology and gaming.

As PC gaming equipment grew more and more expensive, they took an interest in cloud technology and thought of a concept: streaming a high-end Windows PC on an underpowered laptop.

Cloud computing had already been around for years, but the challenge here was much bigger. With this exciting project in mind, they brought together a small community of passionate collaborators, knowing that they could offer a new take on what they loved most: the tech and gaming industries.

Going above and beyond:

Today, Shadow’s cloud-computing service gathers tens of thousands of users, with one of the most robust streaming technologies on the market.

Initially made for and by gamers, we want, with our new offers, to provide compelling alternatives for work and home environments. Now backed by solid strategic partnerships, including OVHcloudw and its worldwide infrastructure, Shadow aims to widen its ambitions.

Our Core Business Platform, releasing in 2022, will open room for scalability and innovation, welcoming open-sourced API and paving the road for an even more secure environment. From cloud VR to an entirely new app ecosystem, our journey in the cloud is just beginning.

"At SHADOW, we have a clear ambition: to set personal technology free from its material boundaries, making it accessible and affordable to everyone in a safe environment. We're incredibly proud of the work that we've accomplished in the last few months and can’t wait to unveil all the projects we are currently working on.” - Éric Sèle, CEO at SHADOW

Shadow PC is a virtual PC service that allows users to remotely access a high-performance computer over the internet. The service is marketed towards gamers, creatives, and businesses, and is intended to provide users with access to powerful technology without the need to purchase and maintain expensive hardware. The service includes access to a Windows PC with configurable hardware resources, and it can be accessed from a variety of devices, including laptops, desktops, and mobile devices. Shadow's subscription service is commitment-free, starting from $29.99, and the company continues to expand its service offering with features such as Shadow Drive, Shadow Business Solutions. Shadow originally founded with a goal of making High-end PC available for gamers, now also expanded its market to creative, business users, and it is backed by solid strategic partnerships, including OVHcloudw and its worldwide infrastructure
Create a potential New Year ad campaign for Shadow PC

Here's a potential New Year ad campaign for Shadow PC:

1. Social Media Campaign: Utilize platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter to create visually stunning ads that showcase the power and flexibility of Shadow PC. Highlight the ability to play the latest games and run demanding software on underpowered devices, and feature testimonials from satisfied customers.
2. Influencer Campaign: Partner with popular gamers, streamers, and content creators to create a series of videos and social media posts that demonstrate the capabilities of Shadow PC. These influencers can give their honest feedback and also show how Shadow PC has helped them in their gaming or content creating experience.
3. TV Commercial: Create a 30-second commercial that highlights the key benefits of Shadow PC, such as the ability to access a powerful Windows PC from any device, and the cost-effectiveness of the service compared to building a high-end gaming PC.
4. Billboard Campaign: Rent billboard space in major cities to advertise Shadow PC with catchy taglines and attention-grabbing graphics.
5. New Year's Special Offer: Offer a limited-time New Year's special to new subscribers, such as a free month of service or a discounted subscription rate.
6. “Upgrade your technology with Shadow PC” : Use the New Year as an opportunity to upgrade technology, make a message that encourages people to start the year off with a powerful technology upgrade.
7. “Leave hardware limits behind”: Use the New Year as a chance to start fresh, Show the audience how Shadow PC can help them do that by leaving hardware limitations behind and having access to a high-performance computer from anywhere.
8. “Work and Play with the power of a high-end PC”: Highlight the versatility of Shadow PC, and show how it's not only suitable for gaming but also for professionals, creatives and businesses, who want to access high-performance computing capabilities from anywhere, anytime.
Give me a New Year campaign idea for Shadow PC surrounding the idea of either upgrading your old device or renewing your old device for Shadow PC

Here's a potential New Year campaign idea for Shadow PC that surrounds the idea of upgrading or renewing your old device:

"Upgrade to the power of a high-end PC with Shadow": Create a marketing campaign that centers around the idea of upgrading your old, outdated device to the power of a high-end PC with Shadow. Use a combination of social media ads, influencer partnerships, and email marketing to reach your audience and promote the message of upgrading to the power of a high-end PC for a fraction of the cost of buying a new one.

For the visual of the campaign, you can use images and videos of old, outdated devices being replaced with sleek, powerful computers running Shadow. Use taglines like "Leave the past behind and upgrade to Shadow" or "Upgrade to a better, faster device with Shadow."

In addition, you can also offer a special deal to anyone who renews their old device to Shadow PC, they can get a discount or a free month of service as an incentive to upgrade.

You can also create a "New Year, New Device" campaign that encourages customers to renew or upgrade their old devices to a Shadow PC and use the New Year as a symbol of a fresh start and an opportunity to upgrade their technology and access high-performance computing capabilities from anywhere.

Finally, you can also create a "Renew Your Device, Renew Your Game" campaign, where you can highlight how upgrading to a Shadow PC can improve the gaming experience and how Shadow can transform an old and slow device into a powerful gaming machine. This could appeal to a large number of gamers who are looking to improve their gaming experience and take their gaming to the next level.
